description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Ferguson's Tourists' Guide to the beautiful and romantic scenery of Killin, Loch Tay, Loch Earn, St. Fillans, Balquhidder, Glenlyon, Rannoch, Fortingall, and the 'Land of famed Breadalbane,' from Aberfeldy to Tyndrum, Loch Awe and Oban. With map and illustrations. Seventh edition" Author: FERGUSON, Malcolm. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010370.eee.41." Page: 127 Place of Publishing: Dundee Date of Publishing: 1899 Publisher: John Leng & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001218629 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
